comment.author: 24231207@N07
comment._content:
Part of the festivities for the dedication of the Maine Monument in Central Park.

May 30, 1913

comment.author: 37865451@N00
comment._content: If I'm not mistaken, this is looking up Broadway from Columbus Circle with the Ansonia building visible straight down Broadway at 73rd/74th where Broadway turns.  Nothing else remains from what I can tell.

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content: Cynthia Wenslow and parkermulligan: Thank you for the additional information about this photograph. Reviewing a few other photographs in our collection confirms this is a view uptown on Broadway from Columbus Circle. An example of an image used to determine this can be found here. When we update the record, we will expand the descriptive information to reflect these details.
